Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
public class ActionController extends Object
ActionController class handle all the messages that all the players have to do during their turn.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ActionController(Model model, Lobby lobby, TurnController turnController)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    handleAction(ChooseCloud m)
    Method handleAction(ChooseCloud) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Students from the Cloud, whose index is obtained to the Entrance.
    void
    handleAction(EntranceToHall m)
    Method handleAction(EntranceToHall) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Hall.
    void
    handleAction(MoveMN m)
    Method handleAction(MoveMN) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves mother nature by a number of steps equal to the value passed as a parameter in the message and checks if the game must end.
    void
    handleAction(MoveToIsland m)
    Method handleAction(MoveToIsland) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Island, whose index is obtained by the message.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionController

      public ActionController(Model model, Lobby lobby, TurnController turnController)
      Constructor ActionController creates a new empty ActionController instance.
      Parameters:
      model - Model - the model associated to the controller.
      lobby - Lobby - the lobby where all the messages are sent.
      turnController - - the turnController used to updating the Phase of the game.

  • Method Details

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(EntranceToHall m)
      Method handleAction(EntranceToHall) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Hall.
      Parameters:
      m - EntranceToHall - the message sent by the client to the server.

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(MoveToIsland m)
      Method handleAction(MoveToIsland) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Student, whose color is obtained by the message, from the Entrance to the Island, whose index is obtained by the message.
      Parameters:
      m - MoveToIsland - the message sent by the client to the server.

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(MoveMN m)
      Method handleAction(MoveMN) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves mother nature by a number of steps equal to the value passed as a parameter in the message and checks if the game must end.
      Parameters:
      m - MoveMN - the message sent by the client to the server.

    • handleAction

      public void handleAction(ChooseCloud m)
      Method handleAction(ChooseCloud) checks if the params of the message are corrected, if there are some mistakes sends a message to the client, otherwise updates the model's state, in particular moves the Students from the Cloud, whose index is obtained to the Entrance.
      Parameters:
      m - ChooseCloud - the message sent by the client to the server.
